body:
Can you change all these function names to begin with capital letters? i.e. UnsortedSegmentInitializationOpSum

Also, the function name should be some kind of action like "InitializeUnsortedSegmentOpSum"   or if a functor, something like "UnsortedSegmentSumInitOp::Run"
body_html:

body_text:
Can you change all these function names to begin with capital letters? i.e. UnsortedSegmentInitializationOpSum
Also, the function name should be some kind of action like "InitializeUnsortedSegmentOpSum"   or if a functor, something like "UnsortedSegmentSumInitOp::Run"
